channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- QRadar Data Synchronization App
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- QRadar Data Synchronization App

item.title: CVE-2022-22313|2024-08-03T03:07:50.405Z -- ibm -- qradar%20data%20synchronization%20app
item.description: IBM QRadar Data Synchronization App 1.0 through 3.0.1 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 217370.
